fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Site title

fields.name: path_prefix
fields.label: Base URL
fields.description: The base URL of this site. Useful for sites hosted under specific path, e.g.: https://www.example.com/my-site/

fields.name: domain
fields.label: Domain
fields.description: The domain of your site, including the protocol, e.g. https://mysite.com/

fields.name: favicon
fields.label: Favicon
fields.description: A square icon that represents your website

fields.name: layout_type
fields.label: Layout
fields.description: The layout of the site

fields.name: style
fields.label: Style
fields.description: The style of the site

fields.name: palette
fields.label: Palette
fields.description: The palette of the site

fields.name: mode
fields.label: Mode
fields.description: The color scheme of the site

fields.name: stackbit_file_path
fields.label: Site configuration File Path
fields.description: The file path of the file that stores this data

fields.name: stackbit_model_type
fields.label: Stackbit Model Type
fields.description: Stackbit model type

fields.name: title
fields.label: Header title
fields.description: The title displayed in the header if logo image not specified

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Logo
fields.description: The logo image displayed on the left side

fields.name: logo_alt
fields.label: Logo alt text
fields.description: The alt text of the logo image

fields.name: has_primary_nav
fields.label: Enable primary navigation menu
fields.description: Display the navigation menu on the left side, next to the site title/logo

fields.name: primary_nav_links
fields.label: Primary navigation menu links
fields.description: List of navigation links

fields.name: has_secondary_nav
fields.label: Enable secondary navigation menu
fields.description: Display the navigation menu on the right side

fields.name: secondary_nav_links
fields.label: Secondary navigation menu links
fields.description: List of navigation links

fields.name: has_anncmnt
fields.label: Enable announcement
fields.description: Display the announcement above the site header

fields.name: anncmnt_content
fields.label: Announcement content
fields.description: The text content of the announcement

fields.name: anncmnt_align
fields.label: Announcement horizontal alignment
fields.description: The horizontal alignment of the announcement content

fields.name: anncmnt_is_home_only
fields.label: Show on home page
fields.description: Display the announcement on the home page only.

fields.name: anncmnt_has_close
fields.label: Enable announcement close
fields.description: Display the announcement close button

fields.name: anncmnt_id
fields.label: Announcement ID
fields.description: A unique identifier, required if close button is enabled. Must be updated each time the announcement content changes

extra.value: This is the about us page

extra.name: twitter:description
extra.value: This is the about us page

data.content:
We are a team of productivity nuts that love to get stuff done without the stress of time management. We work together to optimize workflows, understand use cases and set up our app to be the most productive and useful tool for us, internally, and for you.

![Our team](/images/team.jpg)

## Work Life Balance

Our goal is for work and life to be controlled in one place, to help you maintain a zen state of mind.

> "Tasks and deadlines should not control our time. We should control what when to pay attention to which task." -- Lorinda Mamo, Designer

With App Land, we strive to make it clear and easy to follow a healthy routine of work effectiveness, collaboration, and also family time and social events.

## We Value Your YOU Time

Our team understands that life is a marathon, and it's super important to make sure you take care of YOU and your needs. This is why we try to remind our users to take time off, reward themselves after a job well done, and put down the phone every once in a while when there's nowhere you have to be, or nothing you need to do.

sections.title: Instantly Boost Your Productivity
sections.subtitle: Stop switching between calendars and task lists!
sections.content: App Land combines your work and home calendars with all your task management tools into one seamless experience controlled by a single app that you can use on any device.

grid_items.title: Right When You Need It
grid_items.content: See all of your appointments, work meetings and life events in one place so you know exactly where you need to be at any given time.

grid_items.title: On Any Device
grid_items.content: App Land synchronizes across Android and iOS phones, and on your computer or tablet. See all your dates and info anywhere you are.

grid_items.title: Smart Notifications
grid_items.content: Get color-coded notifications for easy viewing at a glance. Your tasks and appointments show up conveniently in one place.

features.title: Syncronized Calendar
features.subtitle: For true work-life balance
features.content: Stop juggling between calendar apps and productivity tools  from now on all your appointments and meetings appear in one place.

features.title: Comprehensive Task List
features.subtitle: Always be in control
features.content: We all have stuff to do all the time: Work tasks, calls to make, groceries to buy and dry cleaning to pick up. Get all your tasks in one place for easy management.

features.title: Fantastic app for planning your day and future tasks. Works perfectly everyday!
features.subtitle: Alyvia Cope, Design at Company

features.title: A very useful project management app. I use it every day.
features.subtitle: Travis Guidelines, Manager at Company

sections.title: Regain Control of your To Dos
sections.content: Download App Land now and connect with all your calendars, project management tools and task lists  it doesn't get easier than this!

sections.title: Pricing
sections.subtitle: App Land offers affordable plans for private, family and business use.

grid_items.title: Personal
grid_items.subtitle: Just for you
grid_items.content:
---

### $9

per month, billed yearly

* Up to 3 calendar integrations
* Up to 2 task lists
* Color coded notifications
* Up to 2 devices
* Productivity reporting

grid_items.title: Family
grid_items.subtitle: For you and your family members
grid_items.content:
---

### $19

per month, billed yearly

* Shared calendar integrations
* Unlimited task lists
* Synchronized reminders
* Shared badgets
* Up to 5 devices

grid_items.title: Business
grid_items.subtitle: For your entire team
grid_items.content:
---

### $39

per month, billed yearly

* Unlimited calendars
* Unlimited task list integrations
* Project-based color coding
* Scheduled notifications
* Task delegation

grid_items.title: Can I use multiple languages?
grid_items.content:
App Land currently supports English, Spanish, German and French. Other
languages are on the roadmap and should be rolled out by the end of
the year.

grid_items.title: Do you support native iPhone apps?
grid_items.content:
Absolutely. Both native iOS and Android apps are supported and work
seamlessly with App Land.

grid_items.title: Will my tasks be marked as done on their platform?
grid_items.content:
As soon as you complete a task, App Land updates your task lists on
their respective platforms to make sure it's crossed-off immediately.

grid_items.title: What if someone else completes my task?
grid_items.content:
Once a task is complete, you will get a notification letting you know
that you have one less thing to worry about - no matter who completes
it!

grid_items.title: Which integrations do you have?
grid_items.content:
We work with all major productivity apps and platforms and support all
native iOS and Android apps.

grid_items.title: What is your cancellation policy?
grid_items.content:
You can cancel anytime and your tasks and calendars will remain
unaffected.
